chat_mock_goodbye: Thanks for playing. See you next time!
chat_mock_tip_ward: Tip: Place wards in strategic locations for better vision.
chat_mock_tip_farm: Tip: Focus on last-hitting creeps to maximize your gold income.
chat_mock_tip_team: Tip: Stick with your team during late game team fights.
chat_mock_report: Player reported. Thank you for helping improve the community.
chat_mock_muted: You have been muted by the system for {d:duration} minutes.
chat_mock_unmuted: Your mute has expired. You can now chat again.
